name: Mashing Pumpkins
description: Mashing Pumpkins is a high-speed silly hybrid of the classic games ‘Spot the difference’ and ‘Whac-a-Mole’. The player takes on the role of a lost child who stumbles across a haunted farm in the middle of the night. Guided by the wise old farmer, and armed with a wooden fence mallet, they must rid his field of evil pumpkins before the sun comes up. Also playable at: https://mashingpumpkinsgame.com
